title: Discrete Quantum Walk on a Hypercube
subtitle: Discrete Quantum Walk on a Hypercube with a Grover Coin
description: This demo implements a discrete quantum walk on a hypercube graph using a Grover coin. It is the Qmod companion to the discrete quantum walk tutorial, showcasing the generic walk routine applied to a higher-dimensional structure that underlies many quantum algorithms.
friendly_name: Discrete Quantum Walk on a Hypercube
